name: Multisensory Gradior
summary: Interactive platform for multisensory stimulation therapies and behavioral therapies based on Virtual Reality with total immersion. It is a support tool for neuropsychological intervention whose ultimate goal is, through spontaneous interaction with immersive multisensory environments, to reduce anxiety states and behavioral disorders, promote self-control and concentration, as well as develop creative abilities. GRADIOR Multisensorial works on the sensory and psycho-affective dimension of people,...
